title: SQLFROM Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLFROM Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
FROM
The
FROM
command is used to specify which 
table to select or delete data from.
The following SQL statement selects the "CustomerName" and "City" columns 
from the "Customers" table:
Example
SELECT CustomerName, City FROM Customers;

The following SQL statement selects all the columns from the "Customers" 
table:
Example
SELECT * FROM Customers;

The following SQL statement deletes the customer "Alfreds Futterkiste" from 
the "Customers" table:
Example
DELETE FROM Customers
WHERE CustomerName='Alfreds Futterkiste';

Reference

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
DELETE FROM Customers
WHERE CustomerName='Alfreds Futterkiste';
